```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("lab9/data/malaria.csv") # %>% clean_names() to be used with janitor package
```

```{r}
malaria
```
```{r}
malaria_new <- malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases") %>% 
  select(newid, data_date, submitted_date, location_name, Province, District, age_class, cases)
malaria_new
```
Highest Malaria cases on July 30th 2020
```{r}
malaria_new %>% 
  filter(data_date == "2020-07-30") %>% 
  group_by(District) %>% 
  summarise(total_cases = sum(cases, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  arrange(-total_cases)
```
